casebody.data:
HATFIELD, Appellant, v. COLE, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 11, 1894.) Action by Charles William Haddock Hatfield against Alfred B. Cole, individually, etc.

Argued before DALY, C. J., and BOOKSTAVER and PRYOR, JJ.

W. H. Knox, for appellant. C. Fine, for respondent.

No opinion. Ordered that the order appealed from be reversed, with costs.
